mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO trainer ( season_week, team_id, id, name, type, leadership, skill_level, status, start_date, cost ) VALUES ( #{trainer.seasonWeek}, #{trainer.teamId}, #{trainer.id}, #{trainer.name}, #{trainer.type}, #{trainer.leadership}, #{trainer.skillLevel}, #{trainer.status}, #{trainer.startDate}, #{trainer.cost} );
mapper.select: SELECT season_week, team_id, id, name, type, leadership, skill_level, status, start_date, cost FROM trainer WHERE team_id = #{teamId} ORDER BY season_week;
